text: The Marrying Kind is a 1952 American comedy drama movie directed by George Cukor and starring Judy Holliday, Aldo Ray, Ruth Gordon, Charles Bronson, Frank Ferguson, Madge Kennedy. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1952 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:Movies about divorce
title: The Marrying Kind
